review: Easy set up and truly has great features. The device can go with you and the family while on vacation turning your hotel room, to a theater room for many to enjoy movies while out and about and just wanting to enjoy a movie in another state with your family. Our kids love the games and the fact they can watch movies later. Amazon you've done it again as you brought us the Kindle and the Amazon Fire box and made it smaller as you gave us the Fire Stick.

review: The fire stick didn't meet my expectations. The first issue I've noticed is that the stick gets extremely hot after an hour use and starts to flicker. I used the power supply that was included. I'm concerned about it's safety. Another issue I noticed is that the color saturation is set too high. I'm comparing this against my PS3. Lastly, the video quality was subpar when using miracast. The videos I streamed from my other devices weren't sharp.
